content.rendered:
Directed by Rohan Sippy.

Written by Iti Agarwal. Iti Agarwal. Bijesh Jayarajan. Bijesh Jayarajan.

Cast Swastika Mukherjee (Avantika Ahuja). Purab Kohli (Neeraj Ahuja). Aaditya Gupta (Mukul Ahuja). Addinath Kothare (Insp. Prashant Waghmare). Kalyanee Mulay (SI Gauri Karmakar). Khushboo Atre (Ratna Mishra). Saahitya Pansare (ASI Ravi Kumar). Aatm Prakash Mishra (Deep – Madhav’s Assistant). Naeem Khan (COP Mhatre). Gunjan Sinha (Pappu). Shweta Basu Prasad (Adv. Lekha Piramal). Gaurav Gera (Arvind). Simmran Sharma (Nikita Jain – NGO Head). Pradeep Jangid (SI Umesh Bhade). Surbhi Mittal (Neetu – Lekha’s Assistant). Deshna Dugad (Zara Ahuja). Chandresh Singh (Mahendra – Estate Supervisor). Upendra Limaye (Sandeep Shinde). Rajesh Khera (Adv. Hemant Solkar). Bishakha Thapa (Sonam Mathur – TV Journalist). Arunim Mishra (Devesh – Party Attendee). Arjun Jethwa (Somen – Party Attendee). Vedant Sinha (Aamir – Juvenile Home Resident). Suraj Rikame (Rocky – Juvenile Home Resident). Shubham Chowdhury (Hari – Juvenile Home Resident). Hemant Soni (Sampat – Juvenile Home Attendant).

Language Hindi.

Producers Gaurav Banerjee. Prasoon Garg. Sameer Gogate. Deepali Handa. Sharad Kalawar. Pratishtha Malhotra. Varun Malik. Mahesh Menon. Mahesh Menon. Sameer Nair. Rahul Ved Prakash. Deepak Segal. Shilpan Vyas Tinu. Saurav Tiwari.

Production Applause Entertainment Ltd.. BBC Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
